title: Classic Riot
body:
This is why Riot is above every other gaming company, because they always make sure to test EVERYTHING before releasing it to the public, this is why champions and items are BALANCED on release. This is why clash is working as intended, because Riot made sure to TEST TO SEE IF EVERYTHING WAS WORKING BEFORE RIPPING OFF AND WASTING EVERYONES WEEKEND.

GG you idiots

replies.body:
I know this is sarcasm, but they DID test it..


...On the OCE playerbase.
